trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The handler is not required to perform any action, and your code should avoid generating exceptions or allowing exceptions to propagate to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序不需要执行任何操作，并且你的代码应该避免产生异常或允许异常传播到调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that do reach the caller are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 不要访问调用方的任何异常将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatedEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatedEventArgs>委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
